title: Unrecoverable Errors with Panic
description: In this lab, we learn about panics in Rust and how they can be caused by actions in our code or by explicitly calling the panic! macro, and how to use backtraces to track down the source of the panic.

meta.title: Unrecoverable Errors with Panic: Mastering Rust's Panic Handling
meta.description: Explore the power of Rust's panic handling mechanism and learn how to effectively manage unrecoverable errors in your code.
meta.keywords: rust playground, backtrace, error handling, panic, unrecoverable errors, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, rust practice, rust online
